[h1]O RUIM[/h1]

O jogo é repleto de bugs e mal otimizado e sempre trazem eventos reciclados de anos passados, os desenvolvedores são extremamente preguiçosos, folgados, mal escutam a comunidade e só se preocupam com dinheiro e não com qualidade. O jogo é repetitivo demais e não há nada de novo, a comunidade é extremamente tóxica e infantil, não tem como você jogar de uma maneira "casual" ou para se divertir, a menos que sua diversão seja jogar com sangue nos olhos em um jogo totalmente desbalanceado. Jogar partidas solo é sem graça porque você encontra killers tryhardando com 5 geradores como se a vida deles dependessem disso e de killer também é ruim porque você pega swf com build meta. O jogo é desbalanceado, tem um excesso de informações desnecessários e é extremamente repetitivo. Eu recomendaria não perder o seu tempo em um jogo que só se preocupa com dinheiro e que tem um ambiente que prejudique sua saúde mental.

[h1]O BOM[/h1]
Tem crossover com personagens licenciados que é o único motivo de grande parte das pessoas se interessarem no jogo.

[h1]CONCLUSÃO[/h1]
A nota é 1/10. É melhor jogar Roblox, Colheita Feliz, ou qualquer jogo por aí.
Игра довольно хорошая, а комьюнити помойное (не все конеш, но приличная его часть такова).

DBD je zábavná hra hlavně s kamarády když hrajete za přeživší nebo i když hrajete o samotě za zabijáka, má dobrý potenciál. Celá hra je vlastně o tom že se přeživší snaží opravit 5 generátorů a utéct z mapy. Za zabijáka máte za úkol zabít všechny 4 přeživší. 

Hra je zábavná a také velmi návyková ale musíte vzít v potaz že bugy jsou zde na denním pořádku.

Ok, alors je tiens à dire que j'aime beaucoup Dead by daylight et que je sais reconnaître ses nombreuses qualités, mais je sais aussi reconnaîtres ses nombreux défauts. Le jeu possède une ambiance excellente, on se croirait vraiment dans un film d'horreur. Le jeu peut être effrayant du à ses musiques et autres effets sonores, du au design des méchants qui sont vraiment charismatique et effrayant pour la plupart. Le jeu est plutôt addictif et on s'y verra passer de nombreuses heures à réparer ces générateurs et à courser ces survivants. Le jeu est globalement très bon mais alors qu'est ce qu'y m'fais mettre une mauvaise évaluation ? Quelle audace de la part d'un joueur s'approchant des 300 heures de jeu d'oser mettre une note négative ? 

Eh bien je vais vous l'dire, ce jeu n'est parfois pas plaisant à jouer, genre vraiment pas. Tout simplement parce que ce jeu possède l'une des pires communauté que j'ai vu dans un jeu, une communauté à la fois agressive et toxique qui plongera votre expérience de jeu dans une sorte d'humiliation collective, enfin surtout quand on est le tueur. Parce que les survivants qui on de l'expérience sur le jeu n'auront même plus peur de vous, le jeu passe d'un survival horror en ligne angoissant à un "attrape moi si tu peux" extrêmement frustrant en tant que tueur. Ce concept de faire passer un sale moment au tueur peut en décourager plus d'un, ça peut dégoûter d'un jeu très facilement. D'autant plus que le matchmaking de ce jeu est à la ramasse. Pouvant faire jouer des rang 16 avec des des rangs 1. Ce genre de comportements toxiques de la part des survivants peut pousser les tueurs à les adoptés en FaceCampant ou en Tunnelant les survivants ce qui est très frustrant quand on les joues. Certes je critique cette communauté, mais le jeu en lui même pousse les survivants à se comporter de la sorte, parce que l'un des seuls moyens pour les survivants de s'en sortir est de faire tourner en rond le tueur en attendant de lui foutre une palette à la gueule. Le jeu leur donne toutes les cartes pour survivre. C'est simple, un tueur le plus expérimenté qui soit, il ne pourra pratiquement rien faire face à des survivants qui savent un minimum jouer. C'est un jeu de survivants. Certaines Map sont même faites pour que l'expérience du tueur soit encore pire, avec des Map extrêmement étroites rendant impossible l'utilisation de certains tueur (comme le Montagnard par exemple). Certaines maps possèdent des endroits où il est littéralement impossible au tueur d'attraper le survivant (je pense aux maisons d'HaddonField ou encore d'une pièce dans la Map du désert où il est impossible au tueur d'emmener le survivant au crochet) et ce n'ai en aucun cas normal qu'un jeu possède des spot où les survivants soient intouchables. Au lieu de corriger ça les développeurs préfèrent nous pondrent des Dlc à 7 euros pour pouvoir jouer certains personnages. Après il n'y a pas que du mal dans la communauté, il m'est arrivé de parler à des gens très sympa mais cela est très rare dans ce jeu, la plupart des joueurs jouent en équipe et 4 joueurs en équipe qui peuvent communiquer entre eux n'est pas équitable du tout. La plupart des retours de joueurs se résument en "Gg ez", "Baby killer learn 2 play", "fcking camper i Hope you'll die", j'ai juste l'impression que si on ne respecte pas leur pseudo critère de jeu ou qu'on ne les laissent pas gagner, on est une merde à leurs yeux. Ce genre de gens ne sont qu'une bande de grands enfants qui veulent imposer leur supériorité en narguant le tueur le plus possible à base de gestuelles ou de T bag. C'est vraiment dommage qu'un jeu que j'apprécie autant donne autant la possibilité au joueurs d'humilier leur adversaire. Un jeu est surtout fait pour passer du bon temps, il est très déplorable de voir à quel point la plupart des joueurs tryhard comme des porcs en ne jouant bien évidemment jamais seul, toujours accompagnés de leur larbins pour faire chier un maximum de monde, en n'oubliant pas de se déconnecter si le tueur s'apprête à les sacrifier, parce que bon ça serait trop aimable de leur laisser des points. Ce genre de comportements est très fréquents ce qui rend quelques une de mes parties en tueur une véritable humiliation. 

Pour conclure le jeu n'est pas mauvais en soit, mais est beaucoup trop cancérigène, d'autant que le système de ban est complètement biaisé. Le jeu est cool et la plupart de mes parties se passent dans la bonne humeure mais est globalement gâché par cette communauté de grands enfants se croyant maître  de vous parce qu'ils savent tourner autour d'une palette...

Решил поиграть за сурва - обосрался от появления расчлененной азиатки. С тех пор аниме не смотрю.
Решил поиграть за маньяка - никого не нашел. Стало холодно и одиноко.
Решил поиграть за сурва - в момент кипеша - жёппами вытолкали меня к маньяку. Маньяк кивнул и пошел за меня мстить. Люблю карму.
Решил поиграть за маньяка - нарвался на толпу автослесарей. Починили генераторы/проводку/освещение, провели в деревню газ, воду. Построили хату, теперь развожу поросей. Не стал их убивать. Побольше бы таких.
Решил поиграть за сурва - увидел доджеров, способных бегать от маньяка часами, пошел к маньяку на встречу, чтобы у парня не сдали нервы. Помогайте ближним.
Решил поиграть за маньяка - попалась коматозная медсестра с нарколепсией, никогда не думал что призраки могут чем-то болеть. Пока спал - все разбежались. Не люблю подростков.
Решил поиграть за сурва - спокойно чинил генератор, как вдруг обдали блевотиной с головы до ног. На вкус как венский гуляш. Нужно взять рецепт.
Решил поиграть за маньяка - попался Доктор. Напомнил моего учителя по Труду. Труд я всегда любил. Однозначно лайк.

I can't say that this isn't a good game.  Put a lot of time and hours into it with a lot of fun.  I'm giving it a thumbs down due to the greedy nature of the developer and their inability to compensate for lost time/money.  Particularly for 2 skin sets that I put in over 80 hours into 2 rift seasons and 2000 auric cells to unlock, just to be released for purchase in the store later.  I emailed support requesting a compensation for the auric cells spent and got the same response that I do for anytime I contact Behavior.

"Thank you for all your loyalty and your interest in the game.  We really appreciate dedicated players such as you.  We're very sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused.  Please do not hesitate to contact us in case you require any further assistance" 

This same response is sent from their "support" team anytime I send them an email.  

When it comes down to it, this company released rewarded rift skins just to make a few more bucks instead of just making new ones.  This deceptive developer greed speaks loudly and they have lost all of my respect, as well as my thumbs up.

I played this game for a long time as you can see from my hours. But it has finally reached the point where I can’t play it anymore.
 
If you are a new player, this game will most likely be pretty fun for a while, so if you’re going to play this game extremely casually (1-2 times a week for a few hours) you’ll probably enjoy this game, particularly with friends. 

However, if you’re going to play this game as your main game or one of your main games – I can’t recommend this game. The grind is unachievable, the cosmetics and DLCs are overpriced for someone starting from 0 (and the cosmetics are mediocre). However, the biggest issue is their latest involvement of Skilled-based match making. That has made games unbelievably sweaty and unfun. Skill based match making that at the high end for killer and survivor pretty much unplayable. Killers can’t do much of anything, the average killer will get 2-4 hooks at high SBMM level unless they play scummy AF. But even then, it’s a struggle bus. If you go to many of the top Twitch killer main streamers, you’ll see the struggles. Many of them are switching to survivor. For survivor at high SBMM it’s actually fairly easy (and boring) since all your teammates are typically pretty competent if you’re solo queuing. However, all the killers are going play scummy AF in every game to try to get at least 1 kill (tunnelling – proxy camping, etc). The SBMM has highlighted the severe imbalance between survivor and killer and has made it unenjoyable. Gens go way too fast for anyone to enjoy. The devs only care about the new player experience, and pretty much believe once they sucker you in, you’ll stay forever even if you’re having a bad time. And to some degree they have been correct, but this has been the breaking point for me and many other veteran players. 

Like many games, the community / survivors are very toxic. I’m speaking as a former survivor main, but who played killer casually. The devs do not care about veteran players. 

Oh and btw the SBMM score (which you can’t see) is not determined by skill, but actually how long you’re in the match for and if you escape/how many kills. That’s it. There’s nothing else to it. It’s actually less required skilled than the previous ranking system. The devs are trying to make this party game an E-Sports game, with that kind of match making. 

Also another note, there is an ever-increasing amount of cheaters/hackers in this game. Like blatant ones, not ones where it could be questionable. You can report them in game and via their ticket system online. But not much will happen if anything at all even with evidence. Half of them can unban themselves even if you did get them banned.  1/10 of the cheaters probably get perma-banned, but it takes 1+ months for Behaviour to do anything about it. 

TLDR; good for new casual players (<8hrs a week, for maybe a few hundred hours total), but game is buggy/very imbalanced, expensive, too grindy for long term players & game is riddled with hackers. SBMM is s***.
Nice

This game is loads of fun! However, If you care about ranking up don't bother letting your rank ruin your enjoyment of the game. The ranking system is designed for a specific style of play. You have to be chased and you have to do gens and you have to save your teamates in order to rank up as survivor. While that may seem reasonable, it has some serious flaws in its application. If it's all for the entity as a killer why does the entity care if as a killer i didn't break the gens or hit and down and hook all the survivors on more than one occasion and perhaps instead of hooking survivors i just decided to murder them in cold blood and oh BTW maybe the match didn't last more than 10 minutes.... If they are all dead  before escaping why does the entity care? And as survivor if I took the time to complete several gens and hide from the killer the entire game all sneaky beaky like without being chased or hit once and the other survivors happen to do just the same, why wouldn't I be rewarded for doing so? This game is fun and if you are going to play just to play then it can be an absolute blast! If you are competitive though and want to rank up, good luck! 8/10 See you in the fog!

I almost always hate my teammates, that's the only true problem with survivor, bad teammates. With killer, it's so stacked against you that if the survivors just know the basics at high ranks, they can all escape, with you getting 0 kills, playing like a SWF, and while there are plenty of garbage SWF players, their communication advantage almost always prevents 4Ks unless the killer is one of the those top-tier 0.01% of killers that can 4K with Bubba blindfolded, who are known for telling every other killer player they just need to 'getgud'. It's like one of the 2 people that can play one of those absurdly complex fighting-game characters to their full potential, and will never lose to anyone. This game is balanced around those few killer-streamers and the majority of Rank 20 survivor streamers who can't just do gens, loop, and not screw their teammates, and when they die, occasionally scream 'ThIs GaMe Is So UnFaIr To SuRvIvOrS' 'kIlLeR oP' through a cussing fit.

If you can play without getting too attached to winning (getting 4 kills or 4 escapes), the game's great. If not, you will run into the problem of 4 queue SEAL Team Claudette either finishing every gen in 3 minutes or dragging out the game just to feel superior to you, or a killer camping and tunneling everyone they can, despite the fact that almost no one in these games gets much Blood Points. Learn to loop pallets (look up 'dbd killer tiles' or 'dbd survivor tiles' on YouTube), not run to OTHER side of the map to heal (a little bit away unless killer is coming to you is good), strategies against each killer, and don't instantly throw pallets in shacks or long walls (it hurts everyone including you later).

P.S. For your sanity, probably keep gameplay minimum, and do those dailies. If you wait 3 days and come back, as soon as you do one of the three currently available dailies to you, a 4th will appear.

游戏时长差不多800多小时了，现在谈谈对这个游戏的看法吧。刚入坑时疲劳没改，板子没削，极限板没改，那时候是真的欢乐，上段也很好上，自从这些改版实装后就变了。首先是对人类的削弱以及上段机制的变动导致人类必须依靠速修来和屠夫抗衡，使得一整局的氛围都非常紧张，再说说屠夫这一边，表面上zzz对屠夫进行了非常大的加强，然而实际上却是加重了走地屠夫和幻神屠夫的差距。电锯，凛，护士这些能够快速击倒人类的屠夫才能在高段那速修环境生存，其他走地基本灭绝，紫段以上基本就是幻神的天下了，红段就全是护士了，人类一整局就是疯狂修机，5分钟结束战斗的那种。现在zzz想回到以前的那种环境基本不可能，速修意识已经深入人心了，再也不可能停下来了。现在只有两个办法，一个就是削人类修机速度，把以前的疲劳和板子还回来，修改上段机制，还有一个就是削弱护士那些幻神屠夫，电锯这屠夫十分吃地图，操作还有意识就不包含在内了，但护士一定要削，一个萌新练个1，200小时护士就能轻松砍翻那些花了几千小时在人类身上的大佬你们难道觉得很正常吗？我觉得最好是提高护士的门槛，比如给护士闪现加一个能量条的机制，大幅降低她的容错率，再把一些配件修改下，三飞四飞那些配件可以改成增加能量条恢复或者减少冷却，最顶配的红色才能做到三飞，这样那些花费大量时间去练护士的护士长依然强势。

I wanted so badly to love this game but right now it's so utterly broken for new killers. If you like to play survivor then you're in luck, the devs obviously favor survivors so much it's painful. It wouldn't be so bad if the matchmaking weren't a total joke. A handful of rounds into the game and I constantly get matched up against people who have been trolling the game since launch and are beyond coordinated. It's not much fun when everyone but you knows what to do, and it doesn't help that the tutorial is a joke. You basically have to look outside the game for help because the tutorials don't give you a chance to get any real practice in with the killers unless you have friends play unranked rounds with you. The online community is so toxic, I've never dealt with so many keyboard warriors and trolls in my life, and my generation invented that shit. No one is helpful or offers any tips, they just tell you that you suck and spam obscenities, but you can't block them from your matchmaking so... Just be warned you're in for a long and painful "git gud" grind for decent perks with most of the killers before you'll have any chance of winning unless you're using the tiny handful of killers that can teleport/blink around the map, but then you'll be a "toxic killer" and don't even think about camping or you'll get shit for that too. Basically everything you do will be wrong for a long time. This game needs work, badly. As soon as Last Year: The Nightmare comes out I'll probably jump ship.

Ich glaube vielen ist das Spiel jetzt bekannt. Aber dennoch schreibe ich auch mal was dazu.

Ansich macht das Spiel super Spaß und sowohl als Killer als auch Surviver.

ABER,

Surv:

- Du spielst zu 90% mit sogenannten Antimates (Mitspieler die nicht wissen was TEAM bedeutet)
- 95% aller Killer Campen oder Tunneln (jagen dich wieder sobald du vom haken bist und lassen alles stehen und liegen) einen und es raupt enorm den Spielspaß (vorallem wenn das 10 runden hintereinander passiert)
- fast nur mit Freunden spielbar
- Sehr schwer für Anfänger
- Schlecht balanciert 
- Killer sind oft viel zu Stark ( wer den Killer spielen kann ist ja ok, aber es gibt auch Killer die muss man nicht spielen können um zu gewinnen)
- Toxische Surv. (gegenüber beide seiten)

Killer:

- du hast viele toxische surviver (spieler die schon 1k stunden haben und mit ABSICHT auf die kleineren ränge gehen um die Anfänger zu "mobben", hier sind nicht die spieler gemeint die den killer nur loopen)
- Ebenfalls nicht leicht am anfang


Fazit:

das größte Problem ist die Balance in diesem Spiel!
es gibt dazu viele bugs und glitches die das spiel behindern oder manchmal zum Vorteil greifen (beide seiten)

ich empfehle es jedem der gute laune hasst, den nach 10 runden ist diese weg/ dem es nichts aussmacht becampt oder getunnelt zu werden/ der optimistisch bleibt und der schwere Herrausforderungen liebt

ich empfehle es nicht an die, die sehr schnell salty, agressiv werden

schaut dann doch lieber das ihr es bei einem freund mal ausprobieren könnt,  d.h. lange spielen den es dauert bis man im spiel ist

The game is amazing. Has a few bugs which are always easy to fix, however the reporting system needs a lot of work. I've recently been banned for "unsportsmanlike" behavior, and I've never done such a thing. It was most likely some hot-headed killer who reported me for looping them, or just playing the game. I truly believe that a game is more "fair" when you have a good reporting system. I haven't been banned for long, but I still think it was very unjust and unfair for me. I never would be toxic, even if things do anger me. I could probably say this for many people that your reporting system should be fair and just so it could be a much better way of actually banning people for a reason. If someone were to be banned, maybe you should have receipts as to why they were banned so they don't have to constantly question what they've done wrong. Knowing this now, it frightens me to even play this game, knowing that there's going to be someone who's just petty enough to report someone just because they made them angry.
